content: the notorious cowl is a hooded cowl it is knit from the bottom up in one piece my suggestion is to use a wool yarn of sport weight held double together with a lace weight yarn or a wool yarn of worsted weight held together with a lace weight yarn i have used sport weight wool yarn held double together with mohair yarn amount approximately 120g 300m/100g sport weight together with 25g 210m/25g lace weight or 150g 130m/100g worsted weight together with 25g 210m/25g lace weight gauge and needles 15 sts x 19 row = 10x10 cm in stockinette stitch 6 mm circular needles 60 cm or preferred length you will also need one extra 6 mm needle whatever kind you have a slightly smaller/larger size will also work crocket hook tapestry needle stitch markers techniques german short row three needle bind off twisted rib optional tubular cast on optional suggested alternative long tail cast on italian bind off optional suggested alternative regular bind off
